extendedInfo.description: Action Sports Hub (ASH) is the premier Action & Extreme Sports Network that conglomerates all the action/extreme/adventure sports including mixed martial arts in to one global channel. From surfing the biggest waves in the world, jumping off the highest cliffs, dropping into the gnarliest chutes on the mountain, charging the most radical downhill bike trail, falling off the largest waterfalls to grinding the longest rails, we cover the tours, the athletes and the lifestyles of the Extreme World. With daily updates, donât leave your adrenalin at home for this one. Visit us at ActionSportsHub.com for a taste of what youâll see.In order to bring you free content we utilize advertising. We collect general information via an OPTIONAL in-app survey in order to provide ads that may be more relevant to you. Your privacy is an important priority at Blue Wave Media. This data is stored anonymously and cannot be linked back to your specific device.
